price: Àti pé dájúdájú ìyà kan ń bẹ fún àwọn tó ṣàbòsí yàtọ̀ sí (ìyà ọ̀run) yẹn, ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀ wọn ni kò mọ̀.
arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū ʿadhāban dūna dhālika walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
